named-native-query.name: insert.Import
named-native-query.query: INSERT INTO Import (import_code, import_date, total_amount, import_by, comment, suppier_id, warehouse_id) VALUES(:importCode, :importDate, :totalAmount, :importBy, :comment, :suppierId, :warehouseId)

named-native-query.name: insert.ImportMaterial
named-native-query.query: INSERT INTO import_material (quantity, price, sum_price, expire_date, import_id, material_id) VALUES (:quantity, :price, :sumPrice, :expireDate, :importId, :materialId)

named-native-query.name: insert.Material
named-native-query.query: INSERT INTO material (material_code, material_name, unit, unit_price, total_import, total_export, remain, remain_notifycation, group_id, status_id) VALUES (:materialCode, :materialName, :unit, :unitPrice, :totalImport, :totalExport, :remain, :remainNotifycation, :groupId, :statusId)
